Reviews.Title: Not what I was hoping for
Reviews.Author: Julie Hutchings "Napa Mom"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my son to take to outdoor ed. (basically camping with the school).  I thought it was a good idea because he could take more pictures than on a disposable one and I could enhance the pictures on the computer when he got home.  Needless to say I did not want to spend a lot of money in case he lost or broke the camera.  What I found was that the pictures are a horrible quality.  Very grainy and non-focused.  I adjusted the resolution to the highest possible and set the camera on auto focus and it did not come close to the quality of a simple disposable one.

ProductInfo.Features:
4x Digital zoom and SD card support
Digital still camera mode and antishake and face detection features
Rechargeable lithium ion battery
High definition camera
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar 16.1MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch TFT (VS137-BLK-BOX-ESP)
